org.intellimate.izou.system.logger

Class IzouLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.system.logger.IzouLogger

  • public class IzouLogger
extends Object
    Class that manages logging in izou. Can create a new logger for every addOn

    • Method Detail

      • createFileLogger

        public org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ExtendedLogger createFileLogger(String addOnId,
                                                                    String level)
        Creates a new file-logger for an addOn. The logger will log to a file with the addOnId as name in the logs folder of Izou
        Parameters:
        addOnId - the Id of the addOn the logger is created for
        level - level of logger (at what level of log the logger should be activated
        Returns:
        the new logger
